text: The centre provides a conducive and clean environment for having classes. There is also a comfortable waiting area with a mini library. The centre owner is friendly and helpful in arranging the class. My daughter finds the lessons easy to understand and the practices are useful.
I have let my daughter to try out their trial lesson and she told me the lesson was interesting and the lesson was conducted very well. She enjoys it and able to understand well in the class.
Enrolled my P6 girl for Chinese trial class. Am very pleased with the clean and tidy learning environment! If my girl is keen to continue, i would definitely sign her up with Upgrade Learning Lab

This tuition centre offers an exceptional learning environment, with experience and dedicated teachers  . The centre's focus on fostering a positive and motivating atmosphere makes learning enjoyable and effective for my. children.

I wholeheartedly recommend this tuition class for students in P3 to P4. Since my son started attending, I've noticed a significant improvement in his grasp of the subjects. The teachers are not only knowledgeable but also dedicated to each student's success. The atmosphere is conducive to learning, and the course materials are comprehensive. I'm thrilled with my son's progress, and it's all thanks to the exceptional teaching at this tuition center. Five stars without a doubt!
